sentences.en: 59 per cent of people believed the pound should be allowed to float freely.
sentences.cn: 59%的人认为应该允许英镑自由浮动。

sentences.en: A decision by the Finns to float their currency sent a shudder through the foreign exchanges.
sentences.cn: 芬兰允许其货币自由浮动的决定在外汇市场上引起了震动。

sentences.en: A fresh egg will sink and an old egg will float.
sentences.cn: 新鲜鸡蛋会沉下去而不新鲜的会浮在上面。

sentences.en: A plastic bag was floating in the water.
sentences.cn: 一个塑料袋在水中漂浮。

sentences.en: An outsize cotton shoes was mounted on a huge float and paraded through the main street.
sentences.cn: 一双特大的布鞋装在大型花车上在大街上通过.

sentences.en: Empty things float.
sentences.cn: 空的物体会在水中浮起。

sentences.en: Fishing nets are often held in position by floats.
sentences.cn: 渔网常常用浮子固定。

sentences.en: I looked up at the clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.cn: 我仰望着天上的浮云。

sentences.en: I'll have a coke float please.
sentences.cn: 请来一杯带冰淇淋的可口可乐.

sentences.en: It was decided to float the pound because a fixed value was damaging exports.
sentences.cn: 决定浮动英镑的汇率,因为固定汇率不利于出口贸易.

sentences.en: Kevin doesn't exactly float her boat.
sentences.cn: 凯文并没有勾引她。

sentences.en: Leaves floated gently down from the trees.
sentences.cn: 叶子从树上轻轻飘落。

sentences.en: Oil will float on water.
sentences.cn: 油总是浮在水面上.

sentences.en: Strange thoughts float through my mind when I am nearly asleep.
sentences.cn: 我快睡着时产生一种奇怪的念头.

sentences.en: The advisers are delaying the key decision on whether to float 60 per cent or 100 per cent of the shares.
sentences.cn: 顾问们对于发行60%还是100%股份的关键问题迟迟未作决定。

sentences.en: There wasn't enough water to float the ship.
sentences.cn: 水不够深，船浮动不起来。

sentences.en: Through the open windows snatches of melody float on the night air.
sentences.cn: 乐曲断断续续地从敞开的窗户中飘出,在夜空中回荡.

sentences.en: We left him there to float off with the tide, and told him to follow the coast.
sentences.cn: 我们把他放在那里，让他随波漂流，并且告诉他要沿着海岸线走。

sentences.en: We stood and watched the Carnival floats drive past.
sentences.cn: 我们站着观看狂欢节彩车经过。

sentences.en: When a fish bites the hook, the float bobs.
sentences.cn: 当鱼上钩时, 鱼漂上下跳动.

sentences.en: When you're tired of swimming, just float for a while.
sentences.cn: 你游累了就漂浮一会儿.

sentences.en: While there is still sufficient trapped air within the container to keep it buoyant, it will float.
sentences.cn: 只要容器里还留有足够的空气，它就会漂浮着。

words.tran_cn: 浮子；漂浮者；[金融] 流动证券
浮动；飘动，散播；摇摆；付诸实施

phrases.tran_cn: 浮筒油面高度；浮筒水准线
自由浮动；自由浮动时间；公众持股量

trans.tran_cn: 浮体，鱼漂浮子，彩车，备用零钱，加冰激凌的饮料
trans.tran_en: a large vehicle that is decorated to drive through the streets as part of a special event

trans.tran_cn: 使漂浮，飘荡，优雅地走动，提出，使上市，货币自由浮动
trans.tran_en: if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air
if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air
if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air
